title: Great Escape Tip #3: MMOTHS
content:
Irish whizkid MMOTHS is undoubtedly the hottest property amongst young producers at this moment in time.

From shows in the states to his debut EP riding high in home countryâ€™s charts, his euphoric electronic beats are simultaneously beautiful and poignant. Having seen him play to a packed out venue in Ireland, I can say with confidence that his ethereal live shows are not to be missed, especially in such intimate surroundings. Check out the Feel Good Lost directed video for Thnx below, and catch MMOTHS at Audio, 11 May (20.15) and Prince Albert, 12 May (12.15).

More information and tickets for The Great Escape here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
